FunctionalRequirements.Name: Customizable Privacy Settings
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must allow users to customize their privacy settings, specifying which health data is collected and how it is shared, with clear options and summaries provided.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Compliance with Privacy Regulations
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must ensure all privacy settings and data handling practices comply with HIPAA, GDPR, and other relevant regulations, providing transparency and legal adherence.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Audit Trail for Data Access
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must maintain a detailed audit trail of all user and system interactions, including data access and changes to privacy settings, for compliance and liability purposes.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Traceability of User Actions
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must ensure traceability of all user actions and system responses, with no auto-deletion of logs, to support compliance audits and regulatory requirements.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Strict Access Control
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must enforce strict access control mechanisms, prioritizing compliance settings over user or developer preferences to prevent unauthorized data access.
